trans-unit.source: List workloads installed globally or locally.
trans-unit.target: Liste les outils installés globalement ou localement.

trans-unit.source: List workloads installed for the current user.
trans-unit.target: Liste les outils installés pour l'utilisateur actuel.

trans-unit.source: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the workload path option (--workload-path), can only have one at a time. Specify only one of the options: {0}.
trans-unit.target: The local option(--local), the global option (--global), the workload path option (--workload-path), can only have one at a time. Specify only one of the options: {0}.

trans-unit.source: List the workloads installed in the local workload manifest.
trans-unit.target: Liste les outils installés dans le manifeste d'outils locaux.

trans-unit.source: Warning: workload package '{0}' is invalid, contact workload author: {1}
trans-unit.target: Avertissement : Le package d'outils '{0}' n'est pas valide. Contactez l'auteur de l'outil : {1}

trans-unit.source: The directory containing the workloads to list.
trans-unit.target: The directory containing the workloads to list.
